item.title: Laravel Setup
item.description: Laravel https://qiita.com/ucan-lab/items/17c806973e69792ada99#docker%E7%92%B0%E5%A2%83%E3%82%92%E6%A7%8B%E7%AF%89%E3%81%99%E3%82%8B 1$ cd work-github 2$ git clone https://github.com/ucan-lab/docker-laravel.git laravel 3$ cd laravel 4$ rm -rf .git 5$ git init 6$ tree . 7. 8|-- LICENSE 9|-- Makefile 10|-- README.md 11|-- docker 12| |-- ash 13| | |-- aliases.sh 14| | `-- color_prompt.sh 15| |-- mysql 16| | `-- my.cnf 17| |-- nginx 18| | `-- default.conf 19| `-- php 20| |-- Dockerfile 21| |-- php.ini 22| `-- psysh 23| `-- config.
